page.title: 10 A Typical Monday at school
page.content: At 9am school starts,we come in and sit down.when we are seated the register is called by ourteacher. After this we go to assembly to pray and sing hymns together.when assembly has ended we go back into the classroom and read a book of Greek legends.when we have read a chapter of the book we do Mathematics from a book called Alpha 3 or from the blackboard. When we have finished it is time for a 15 minute break.After this we go back to the classroom and do English Grammar.At midday there is a lunch break.We go to the hall for our lunch. When everybody has finished we return to class and get changed for rounders. When this period is over it is time for last break.After this we do music until 3.45pm,which is when we go home unless we are staying for an after school club.
